com.btc.redg.generator.extractor

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btc.redg.generator.extractor.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends Object

    A class that provided useful methods for connecting to a extractor, executing SQL scripts and analyzing the extractor.

    The normal workflow would be to connect to the extractor, execute a few scripts and then run the analysis. 

     Connection conn = DatabaseManager.connectToDatabase(...);
 DatabaseManager.executePreparationScripts(conn, scripts);
 Database db = DatabaseManager.crawlDatabase(conn, schemaRule, tableRule);

        public DatabaseManager()

    • Method Detail

      • connectToDatabase

        public static Connection connectToDatabase(String jdbcDriver,
                                           String connectionString,
                                           String username,
                                           String password)
                                    throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                           SQLException
        Loads the JDBC driver specified in jdbcDriver and establishes a JBDC connection with the given connectionString, username and password.
        Parameters:
        jdbcDriver - The fully-qualified class name of the JDBC driver
        connectionString - The JDBC connection string
        username - The extractor username
        password - The extractor password
        Returns:
        The established JDBc connection
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - Gets thrown when loading the driver fails
        SQLException - Gets thrown when connection to the extractor fails

      • executePreparationScripts

        public static void executePreparationScripts(Connection connection,
                                             File[] sqlScripts)
                                      throws IOException,
                                             SQLException
        Executes the SQL scripts specified in the sqlScripts parameter. The SQL gets split into statements and gets executed via the connection by a ScriptRunner. The output from the script runner simply gets discarded.
        Parameters:
        connection - The JDBC connection to use for script execution
        sqlScripts - The array containing all sql files that should be executed
        Throws:
        IOException - Gets thrown when a file IO fails
        SQLException - Gets thrown when the a part of the SQL could not be executed

      • crawlDatabase

        public static schemacrawler.schema.Catalog crawlDatabase(Connection connection,
                                                         schemacrawler.schemacrawler.InclusionRule schemaRule,
                                                         schemacrawler.schemacrawler.InclusionRule tableRule)
                                                  throws schemacrawler.schemacrawler.SchemaCrawlerException
        Starts the schema crawler and lets it crawl the given JDBC connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The JDBC connection
        schemaRule - The InclusionRule to be passed to SchemaCrawler that specifies which schemas should be analyzed
        tableRule - The InclusionRule to be passed to SchemaCrawler that specifies which tables should be analyzed. If a table is included by the tableRule but excluded by the schemaRule it will not be analyzed.
        Returns:
        The populated Catalog object containing the metadata for the extractor
        Throws:
        schemacrawler.schemacrawler.SchemaCrawlerException - Gets thrown when the database could not be crawled successfully
